verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> came אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> Now it came to pass after מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> crying שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul וְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> when David שָׁ֔ב <S%H7725><s%> was returned מֵהַכּ֖וֹת <S%H5221><s%> from the slaughter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָעֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> of the Amalekites וַיֵּ֧שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> had abode דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> and David בְּצִקְלָ֖ג <S%H6860><s%> in Ziklag יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> days שְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> two

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <S%H1961><s%> came בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗י <S%H7992><s%> It came even to pass on the third וְהִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> behold אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> that behold a man בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> came מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> out הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֙ <S%H4264><s%> out of the camp מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> from שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> from Saul וּבְגָדָ֣יו <S%H899><s%> with his clothes קְרֻעִ֔ים <S%H7167><s%> rent וַאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> and earth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> upon his head וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> came בְּבֹא֣וֹ <S%H935><s%> and [so] it was when he came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> to David וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> that he fell אַ֖רְצָה <S%H776><s%> to the earth וַיִּשְׁתָּֽחוּ׃ <S%H7812><s%> and did obeisance

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said לוֹ֙ דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֵ֥י <S%H335><s%> where מִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> he תָּב֑וֹא <S%H935><s%> unto him From whence comest וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> thou? And he said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> from מִמַּחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> unto him Out of the camp יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel נִמְלָֽטְתִּי׃ <S%H4422><s%> am I escaped

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָ֥יו <S%H413><s%> about דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> And David מֶה־ <S%H4100><s%> unto him How הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> things הַגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> tell נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> I beseech thee לִ֑י וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> me And he answered אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> after נָ֨ס <S%H5127><s%> are fled הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> That the people מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <S%H4421><s%> from the battle וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> and also הַרְבֵּ֞ה <S%H7235><s%> and many נָפַ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> also are fallen מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> of the people וַיָּמֻ֔תוּ <S%H4191><s%> and dead וְגַ֗ם <S%H1571><s%> also שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> and Saul וִיהוֹנָתָ֥ן <S%H3083><s%> and Jonathan בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son מֵֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> are dead

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> unto the young man הַמַּגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> that told ל֑וֹ אֵ֣יךְ <S%H349><s%> How יָדַ֔עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> him How knowest כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֥ת <S%H4191><s%> be dead שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> thou that Saul וִיהֽוֹנָתָ֥ן <S%H3083><s%> and Jonathan בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him said הַנַּ֣עַר ׀ <S%H5288><s%> And the young man הַמַּגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> that told ל֗וֹ נִקְרֹ֤א <S%H7122><s%> by chance נִקְרֵ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7136><s%> As I happened בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> upon mount הַגִּלְבֹּ֔עַ <S%H1533><s%> Gilboa וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> behold Saul נִשְׁעָ֣ן <S%H8172><s%> leaned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on חֲנִית֑וֹ <S%H2595><s%> upon his spear וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> and behold הָרֶ֛כֶב <S%H7393><s%> and lo the chariots וּבַעֲלֵ֥י <S%H1167><s%> archer הַפָּרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6571><s%> and the horsemen הִדְבִּקֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H1692><s%> followed hard

וַיִּ֥פֶן <S%H6437><s%> And when he looked אַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> behind וַיִּרְאֵ֑נִי <S%H7200><s%> him he saw וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> me and called אֵלָ֔י <S%H413><s%> to me וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> unto me And I answered הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2005><s%> behold

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And he said לִ֖י מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> Who אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you [וַיֹּאמֶר כ] (וָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said ק) אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> about עֲמָלֵקִ֖י <S%H6003><s%> him I [am] an Amalekite אָנֹֽכִי׃ <S%H595><s%> he

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> He said אֵלַ֗י <S%H413><s%> about עֲמָד־ <S%H5975><s%> unto me again Stand נָ֤א <S%H4994><s%> Please עָלַי֙ <S%H5921><s%> beside וּמֹ֣תְתֵ֔נִי <S%H4191><s%> I pray thee upon me and slay כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because אֲחָזַ֖נִי <S%H270><s%> is come הַשָּׁבָ֑ץ <S%H7661><s%> me for anguish כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> because כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all manner ע֥וֹד <S%H5750><s%> still נַפְשִׁ֖י <S%H5315><s%> upon me because my life בִּֽי׃

וָאֶעֱמֹ֤ד <S%H5975><s%> So I stood עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> beside וַאֲמֹ֣תְתֵ֔הוּ <S%H4191><s%> upon him and slew כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> him because I was sure כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יִֽחְיֶ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> that he could not live אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> after נִפְל֑וֹ <S%H5307><s%> that he was fallen וָאֶקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> and I took הַנֵּ֣זֶר ׀ <S%H5145><s%> the crown אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside רֹאשׁ֗וֹ <S%H7218><s%> that [was] upon his head וְאֶצְעָדָה֙ <S%H685><s%> and the bracelet אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> beside זְרֹע֔וֹ <S%H2220><s%> that [was] on his arm וָאֲבִיאֵ֥ם <S%H935><s%> and have brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> them hither unto my lord הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2008><s%> here

וַיַּחֲזֵ֥ק <S%H2388><s%> took hold דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> Then David [בִּבְגָדֹו כ] (בִּבְגָדָ֖יו <S%H899><s%> apparel ק) וַיִּקְרָעֵ֑ם <S%H7167><s%> and rent וְגַ֥ם <S%H1571><s%> and also כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָאֲנָשִׁ֖ים <S%H376><s%> the men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who אִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H854><s%> for

וַֽיִּסְפְּדוּ֙ <S%H5594><s%> And they mourned וַיִּבְכּ֔וּ <S%H1058><s%> and wept וַיָּצֻ֖מוּ <S%H6684><s%> and fasted עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָ֑רֶב <S%H6153><s%> until even עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for שָׁא֞וּל <S%H7586><s%> for Saul וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <S%H3083><s%> and for Jonathan בְּנ֗וֹ <S%H1121><s%> his son וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and for עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> and for the people יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> God וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> and for the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because נָפְל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> because they were fallen בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> by the sword ס

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <S%H5288><s%> unto the young man הַמַּגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> that told ל֔וֹ אֵ֥י <S%H335><s%> Where מִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> he אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> and he וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> him Whence [art] thou? And he answered בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> I [am] the son אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> of an גֵּ֥ר <S%H1616><s%> alien עֲמָלֵקִ֖י <S%H6003><s%> an Amalekite אָנֹֽכִי׃ <S%H595><s%> I

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> then דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֵ֚יךְ <S%H349><s%> How לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> were not יָרֵ֔אתָ <S%H3372><s%> unto him How wast thou not afraid לִשְׁלֹ֙חַ֙ <S%H7971><s%> to stretch forth יָֽדְךָ֔ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand לְשַׁחֵ֖ת <S%H7843><s%> to destroy אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְשִׁ֥יחַ <S%H4899><s%> anointed יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD'S

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called דָוִ֗ד <S%H1732><s%> And David לְאַחַד֙ <S%H259><s%> one מֵֽהַנְּעָרִ֔ים <S%H5288><s%> of the young men וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said גַּ֣שׁ <S%H5066><s%> Go near פְּגַע־ <S%H6293><s%> [and] fall בּ֑וֹ וַיַּכֵּ֖הוּ <S%H5221><s%> upon him And he smote וַיָּמֹֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> him that he died

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָיו֙ <S%H413><s%> about דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And David [דָּמֵיךָ כ] (דָּמְךָ֖ <S%H1818><s%> bloodshed ק) עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> is on רֹאשֶׁ֑ךָ <S%H7218><s%> [be] upon thy head כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for פִ֗יךָ <S%H6310><s%> for thy mouth עָנָ֤ה <S%H6030><s%> hath testified בְךָ֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> against thee saying אָנֹכִ֥י <S%H595><s%> I מֹתַ֖תִּי <S%H4191><s%> I have slain אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מְשִׁ֥יחַ <S%H4899><s%> anointed יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD'S ס

וַיְקֹנֵ֣ן <S%H6969><s%> lamented דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for הַקִּינָ֖ה <S%H7015><s%> with this lamentation הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> over Saul וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over יְהוֹנָתָ֥ן <S%H3083><s%> and over Jonathan בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> his son

וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <S%H559><s%> (Also he bade לְלַמֵּ֥ד <S%H3925><s%> them teach בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> the children יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah קָ֑שֶׁת <S%H7198><s%> [the use of] the bow הִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> behold כְתוּבָ֖ה <S%H3789><s%> behold [it is] written עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> in סֵ֥פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in the book הַיָּשָֽׁר׃ <S%H3477><s%> of Jashar

הַצְּבִי֙ <S%H6643><s%> The beauty יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on בָּמוֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H1116><s%> upon thy high places חָלָ֑ל <S%H2491><s%> is slain אֵ֖יךְ <S%H349><s%> How נָפְל֥וּ <S%H5307><s%> fallen גִבּוֹרִֽים׃ <S%H1368><s%> how are the mighty

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תַּגִּ֣ידוּ <S%H5046><s%> Tell בְגַ֔ת <S%H1661><s%> [it] not in Gath אַֽל־ <S%H408><s%> nay תְּבַשְּׂר֖וּ <S%H1319><s%> publish בְּחוּצֹ֣ת <S%H2351><s%> [it] not in the streets אַשְׁקְל֑וֹן <S%H831><s%> of Askelon פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or תִּשְׂמַ֙חְנָה֙ <S%H8055><s%> rejoice בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> lest the daughters פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H6430><s%> of the Philistines פֶּֽן־ <S%H6435><s%> Or תַּעֲלֹ֖זְנָה <S%H5937><s%> triumph בְּנ֥וֹת <S%H1323><s%> lest the daughters הָעֲרֵלִֽים׃ <S%H6189><s%> of the uncircumcised

הָרֵ֣י <S%H2022><s%> Ye mountains בַגִּלְבֹּ֗עַ <S%H1533><s%> of Gilboa אַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor טַ֧ל <S%H2919><s%> [let there be] no dew וְאַל־ <S%H408><s%> nor מָטָ֛ר <S%H4306><s%> neither [let there be] rain עֲלֵיכֶ֖ם <S%H5921><s%> and וּשְׂדֵ֣י <S%H7704><s%> upon you nor fields תְרוּמֹ֑ת <S%H8641><s%> of offerings כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> For שָׁ֤ם <S%H8033><s%> there נִגְעַל֙ <S%H1602><s%> is vilely cast away מָגֵ֣ן <S%H4043><s%> for there the shield גִּבּוֹרִ֔ים <S%H1368><s%> of the mighty מָגֵ֣ן <S%H4043><s%> the shield שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> of Saul בְּלִ֖י <S%H1097><s%> not מָשִׁ֥יחַ <S%H4899><s%> [as though he had] not [been] anointed בַּשָּֽׁמֶן׃ <S%H8081><s%> with oil
